subclassFeature.name: Moon Dancer Domain
entries: The Moon Dancers are clerics that sworn their blades to protect those who are in need, fight all evil, and help others appreciate the joy of life through the beauty of the arts.

Coming from the underdark, the first Moon Dancers were devoted to Eilistraee, the Dark Maiden. Guided by her kindness, they fought courageously to liberate the Drow from the grasp of Lolth, leading them to the surface.

The art of the Moon Dance has been adopted by some followers of other moon-bound deities, but its purpose remains pure and untouched. Moon Dancers travel through the realms putting their kind hearts at others disposal, and they are not afraid to wield their blades to confront evil.

entries.caption: Moon Dancer Domain Spells
rows: {@spell aura of life}, {@spell freedom of movement}

entries.name: Moonlight Dance
entries: When you choose this domain at 1st level, you gain proficiency with the {@item shortsword|PHB}, {@item rapier|PHB} and {@item longbow|PHB}.
You also gain proficiency in the {@skill Performance} skill if you don't already have it.

entries.name: Moonlight Protection
entries: In kindness there is strength, and its beauty is your protection. While you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, you gain Unarmored Defense and your AC equals to 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.
Those in need must be protected, and no evil hides from your sight. You have {@sense darkvision} of 120 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision} from your race, its range increases by 60 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: The Moon Dance
entries: You use your Channel Divinity to dance and invoke the power of the moonlight for 1 minute, gaining the following benefits:

items: You have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) checks.
You gain a bonus to any Constitution saving throw you make to maintain concentration on a spell. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).
Whenever you make a Charisma ({@skill Performance}) check, you gain a bonus to the check equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).
Your walking speed increases by 10 feet while you are under the effect of the Unarmored Defense provided by Moonlight Protection.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: Starting at 6th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Hunt
entries: At 8th level, you gain the ability to mark your enemies with divine energy. When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can call the favor of the moon to mark the target for 10 minutes. While the target has the mark on themselves, they cannot hide from you and you can sense the direction to the creature's location. Additionally, if the creature is moving, you know the direction of its movement. You can only have one creature marked at the time.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Swiftness of the Moon
entries: Starting at 17th level, you add your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1) to the damage of your weapon attacks. Additionally, your speed is doubled while under the influence of {@subclassFeature Channel Divinity: The Moon Dance|Cleric||Moon Dancer|Matthers3_Moon_Dancer|2}.
